gen:link.label:label: BV719: The item "Total amount of gross TP including LTG measures and transitional measures" reported in template S.22.01 - Impact of long term guarantees measures and transitionals should be equal to the sum of TP non-life, TP life excluding index-linked and UL and Technical provisions – index–linked and unit–linked reported in S.02.01 - Balance sheet. -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.22.01; Expression: {S.22.01, r0010,c0010}={S.02.01, r0510,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0600,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0690,c0010}

BV719: The item "Total amount of gross TP including LTG measures and transitional measures" reported in template S.22.01 - Impact of long term guarantees measures and transitionals should be equal to the sum of TP non-life, TP life excluding index-linked and UL and Technical provisions – index–linked and unit–linked reported in S.02.01 - Balance sheet. -->Template 1: S.02.01; Template 2: S.22.01; Expression: {S.22.01, r0010,c0010}={S.02.01, r0510,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0600,c0010}+{S.02.01, r0690,c0010}
